trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its URL.
This class cannot be inherited.
The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file.
trans-unit.target: Se considera la dirección URL completa, incluido el protocolo (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) y el archivo.

trans-unit.source: For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm es una dirección URL completa.

trans-unit.source: URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position.
trans-unit.target: Las direcciones URL pueden coincidir exactamente o un carácter comodín en la posición final.

trans-unit.source: For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* is a wildcard URL.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* es una dirección URL de carácter comodín.

trans-unit.source: The URL for which to test.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition" /> class with the URL that determines membership.
The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm.
trans-unit.target: Se considera la dirección URL completa, incluido el protocolo (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) y el archivo, por ejemplo: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm.

trans-unit.source: URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*.
trans-unit.target: Las direcciones URL pueden coincidir exactamente o un carácter comodín en la posición final, por ejemplo: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="url" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="url" /> must be an absolute URL.
The evidence set against which to make the test.
Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This membership condition tests only the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> evidence object.
trans-unit.target: Esta condición de pertenencia sólo comprueba el <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> objeto evidence.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition.Url" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition.Url" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
The object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition" />.
Determines whether the URL from the specified object is equivalent to the URL contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition" />.

<see langword="true" /> if the URL from the specified object is equivalent to the URL contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition.Url" /> property of the current object or the specified object is <see langword="null" />.
Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
The policy level context, used to resolve named permission set references.
Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
Gets the hash code for the current membership condition.
The hash code for the current membership condition.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition.Url" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
Creates and returns a string representation of the membership condition.
A string representation of the state of the membership condition.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition.Url" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
The policy level context for resolving named permission set references.
Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />.
An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition.Url" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the URL for which the membership condition tests.
The URL for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: La dirección URL para el que se comprueba la condición de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file.
trans-unit.target: Se considera la dirección URL completa, incluido el protocolo (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) y el archivo.

trans-unit.source: For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm es una dirección URL completa.

trans-unit.source: URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position.
trans-unit.target: Las direcciones URL pueden coincidir exactamente o un carácter comodín en la posición final.

trans-unit.source: For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* is a wildcard URL.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* es una dirección URL de carácter comodín.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.UrlMembershipCondition.Url" /> to <see langword="null" />.
Value is not an absolute URL.
